mapper.insert: insert into tab_report (REPORT_UUID,REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_USER_NAME, REPORT_USER_UUID, REPORT_TIME, REPORT_TYPE, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, REPORT_UPDATE_UUID,REPORT_STAUS,REPORT_TEL,IMAGE_PATH) values (#{reportUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reportTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportUserUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reportUpdateUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reportStaus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reportTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT tr.REPORT_UUID as reportUuid, tr.REPORT_TITLE as reportTitle, tr.REPORT_CONTENT as reportContent, tr.REPORT_USER_NAME as reportUserName, tr.REPORT_USER_UUID as reportUserUuid, tr.REPORT_TIME as reportTime, tr. REPORT_TYPE as reportType, tr.REPORT_STAUS as reportStaus, tr. LAST_MODIFY_TIME as lastModifyTime, tr. REPORT_UPDATE_UUID as reportUpdateUuid, tr.REPORT_TEL as reportTel, tr.IMAGE_PATH as imagePath, trr.REPLY_CONTENT as replyContent, trr.REPLY_TIME as replyTime, trr.REPLY_USER_NAME as replyUserName , trr.REPLY_USER_UUID as replyUserUuid FROM tab_report tr LEFT JOIN psmc.tab_report_reply_rel trrr ON tr.REPORT_UUID = trrr.REPORT_UUID LEFT JOIN tab_report_reply trr ON trr.REPLY_UUID= trrr.REPLY_UUID where tr.REPORT_UUID = #{reportUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
